explanation: [0-0] Two men are standing opposite each other on a gray concrete floor outdoors. The man on the left is wearing a white T-shirt and black pants, with blue and white sneakers. The man on the right is wearing a light gray shirt, black pants, and white shoes. There are green trees and some buildings around them, and some steps beside them.

[0-4] Then the American flag appears from the left, the man in the light gray shirt takes out a pistol and shoots at the man in the white T-shirt. The man in the white T-shirt slowly kneels down and falls to the ground facing right. The man in the light gray shirt watches.
